How to use RGB:<br><br>
1.Create an RGB offer with any value.<br>
2.Rename the file with RGB.offer<br>
3.If you have <a href=https://kevacoin.org>kevacoin</a> wallet just create a key RGB.offer with the value in the offer file.<br>
4.You can also upload the RGB.offer file on <a href=https://cat.sale/open>cat.sale/open</a> to get a shortcode.<br>
5.Open your cat.sale/shortcode or dxid.io/shortcode to see the effect later.<br>
